report.oneYear: Report by the months of the year
report.regionQuantityReport: The number of poultry by regions Report
report.calculation_import2: +By years = The total number of herds in the type of livestock in the selected year (unit:item)
report.calculation_import3: +By mounth= The total number of herds entering by livestock type during that period (unit:item)
report.calculation_export2: +By years = The total population according to the type of pet during that period (unit:item)
report.calculation_export3: +By mounth= the total population according to the type of pet during that period (unit:item)
report.calculation_export2_meat: + By years = The total meat output in the selected year (unit:kg)
report.calculation_export3_meat: + By mounth= the total meat output in the selected time period (unit:kg)
report.calculation_export2_egg: + By years = The total egg output in the selected year (unit:item)
report.calculation_export3_egg: + By mounth= the total egg output in the selected time period (unit:item)
report.calculation_export2_livestock: + By years = The total livestock in the selected year
report.calculation_export3_livestock: + By mounth= the total egg output in the selected time period
report.calculation_compare1: + Total poultry flock of a pet = total number of animals from the previous animal + total number of animals in the selected time period (unit: item)
report.calculation_compare_import1: + Increase in number of poultry flocks of a pet = total number of poultry flocks of that pet within the selected time period (unit: item)
report.calculation_compare_export1: + Poultry flocks of 1 pet = total number of flocks of that pet within the selected time period (unit:item)
report.calculation_compare_export1_egg: + By year = total egg yield within the selected time period (unit:item)
report.calculation_compare_export2_egg: + By month= Choose 2 timelines to compare results.
report.calculation_compare_export1_meat: + Meat yield = total Meat yield within the selected time period (unit:kg)
report.calculation_ratio1: + Poultry structure 1 region = (total number of regions / total number of regions) * 100 (unit:%).
report.calculation_ratio2: + Poultry structure 1 province = (total number of provinces / total number of regions of that province) * 100 (unit:%).
report.calculation_by_ratio1: + Poultry structure by livestock of 1 region = (The total number of such animals by region/The total number of all pets by region )*100 (unit: %).
report.calculation_by_ratio2: + Poultry structure according to product direction of a domestic animal=(The total amount of that pet according to the product direction/ The total amount of that pet)*100 (unit: %).
report.calculation1: Number of poultry of a species= The total quantity of that species from the previous to the chosen time period (unit: item).
report.calculation_formula_by_provinces: Number of poultry in a province in a year =The total number of provinces from the previous to the selected year (unit: item).
report.calculation_formula_by_provinces1: For example: provinces A have 1000 item (year 2018), provinces B have 2000 item (year 2019). So:
report.calculation_formula_by_regions: Number of poultry in one area of the year = The total number of provinces in that region from the previous year to the selected year (unit: item).
report.calculation_formula_by_regions1: For example: The provincial A have 1000 item (year 2018), provincial B have 2000 item (year 2019), Both provinces belong to the region C. So:
report.calculation_formula_by_regions2: + Number of poultry area C (year 2018)= number of provincesA(2018)=1000 item.
report.calculation_formula_by_regions3: + Number of poultry area C (year 2019)= number of provincesA(2018)+ number of provincesB(2019) =1000+2000=3000 item.
report.regionDetailQuantityReport: The number of poultry in the provinces by region Report
report.animalRatioByRegionReport: Animal ratio by region at the time Report
report.compareImportReport: Compare Import Quantity Report of poultry
report.compareExportReport: Compare Export Quantity Report of poultry
report.listFarmDistrict: Number of poultry in the province's districts
report.listFarmWards: The number of poultry in the communes belongs
report.structure: Proportion of Poultry population for regions
report.ratioProduct: Poultry structure according to product orientation for livestock
report.densityMapCalculation: Calculation formula: Total number of children of the province / total area of the province (unit: children/km2)
report.viewDensityRegion: See the density of the regions
report.notData: There are no data on the system
report.calculation_export2_liveStockProduct: + By year = total output of livestock products in the selected year
report.calculation_export3_liveStockProduct: + By month = total output of livestock products in the selected period
report.calculation_compare_export1_liveStockPro: + Output of livestock products = total output of livestock products of that livestock product in the selected time period
report.warning_choose_lives_stock_product: You must choose live stock product
report.reportNumberAnimalsAndNumberFarmsAccordi: Report the number of animals and the number of farms according to the red book

percentOfGrowthReport.calculation1: Report of child growth per year. This report will list the number of newly raised poultry over the years, compare and give figures of growth or decline each year (units%). Child growth this year = (number of new poultry raised this year - number of new poultry raised next year) / number of new poultry raised next year * 100
percentOfGrowthReport.calculation2: Annual meat production growth report: This report will list the output of meat output (based on declared data) in years and compare to give the annual growth or decrease figures (single %). Growth of meat production this year = (volume of meat produced this year - volume of meat produced next year) / volume of meat produced next year * 100
percentOfGrowthReport.calculation3: Egg production growth report: This report will list the output of egg production (based on declared data) in the years and compare to give the number of growth or decline each year (unit% ). Growth of egg production this year = (number of eggs produced this year - the number of eggs produced next year) / number of eggs produced next year * 100
percentOfGrowthReport.moreTimeErr: From year must not be greater than to year
percentOfGrowthReport.compareTimeErr: From year to year is not equal

productivityForecast.predict_the_number_of_live_meat_slightly: Predict the number of live meat slightly
productivityForecast.compare_predict_the_number_of_live_meat_: Compare predict the number of live meat slightly
productivityForecast.calculation: Meat yield = Number of cycles that can be * quantity * weight gain * (100 - % loss) / 100
productivityForecast.calculation1: Egg production = Number of possible breeding cycles * quantity * (annual egg production by breed / 365) * (100 - % loss) / 100
productivityForecast.calculation_productivity_forecast_meat_1: - Child output = Number of cycles that can be * quantity * weight gain * (100 - % loss) / 100
productivityForecast.calculation_productivity_forecast_meat_2: + A farming cycle = Breeding time of each pet.
productivityForecast.calculation_productivity_forecast_meat_3: + After 1 cycle, after 2 weeks (14 days) can continue the new culture cycle.
productivityForecast.calculation_productivity_forecast_meat_4: + The first period begins from the date of herd input.
productivityForecast.calculation_predict_the_number_of_live_m: - Child output = Number of cycles that can be * quantity * (100 - % loss) / 100
+ A farming cycle = Breeding time of each pet.
+ After 1 cycle, after 2 weeks (14 days) can continue the new culture cycle.
+ The first period begins from the date of herd input.
productivityForecast.detailEgg: Detailed forecast of egg yield of breeds
productivityForecast.detailMeat: Detailed prediction of meat yield of breeds
